steps.prompt: Hello! My name’s Mark. What prompted you to seek help with your debts today?
Great, I look forward to helping you to clear off your debts. Can you let me know who I’m speaking to?
Just so I can point you in the right direction, what would you say your main concern is with the debts?
Don’t worry {name}, we’re going to help you with your debts today. First, let’s set up your secure client portal where you can add your details, upload documents and track progress.
Please enter your email address and create a 4-digit PIN to log in to your secure client portal. There’s a ‘Forgot PIN’ option that sends a reset email.
I just need to make you aware there’s no obligation to act on today’s advice. Free debt help is available at moneyhelper.org.uk.
What’s your current employment status — employed, self-employed, unemployed/on benefits, pension/retired, or mixed?
Thanks. I’ll tailor the document list based on what you’ve just told me.

Please upload: • Proof of ID (passport/driving licence or birth certificate) • Last 3 months **bank statements** (each account) • Last **3 payslips** (12 weeks if paid weekly) • Any creditor statements/letters • If you receive benefits, your latest UC statement • Car finance/HP docs if applicable.

Please upload: • Proof of ID • Last 3 months **bank statements** (each account) • Latest **SA302** and **tax year overview** (or most recent tax return) • Any creditor statements/letters • If you receive benefits, your latest UC statement • Car finance/HP docs if applicable.

Please upload: • Proof of ID • Last 3 months **bank statements** (each account) • Latest **benefit statements** (e.g., full UC breakdown for 12 months + current month) • Any creditor statements/letters • Car finance/HP docs if applicable.
If you’re busy, you can come back later—the chat and portal are saved. Otherwise, shall I confirm next steps?

Thanks — our assessment team will contact you shortly and start working on your case. Please check your client portal daily for progress. It’s been lovely speaking with you today — if you’ve any questions, leave them in the portal. Have a great day!
